text: Ne nikhumukhofwa tsimbabaasi tsiefu niyakhamala okhunyakhanakhwo, toto alaboola mbu: “ kano niko kekhoyeshele, ne shembara indukho nilibaho tawe, ne nengalusibwa khu Nyasaye wanje Omulesi, toto esie endi nende obulayi ewuwe,” khuliboolela abakhayi kabakholanga, ne toto khuli bahelesia eshinyasio eshisiro
